summary: This function creates an iterable whose iterator is the given iterator.
returns: Return an unmodifiable view of the input.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val capitals = [%22London%22, %22Berlin%22, %22Paris%22, %22Rome%22];%0A%0A    val iterator = capitals.iterator();%0A%0A    val result = F::iter(iterator);%0A%0A    foreach (capital : String in result)%0A    {%0A        F::println(capital);%0A    }%0A}
